ResourceHeader.Description: Site hosted by Fundamental Technologies with access to HISCALE data as well as documentation and explanations of HISCALE print-groups and CSV file nomenclature.

InformationURL.Name: Explaination of HISCALE print-groups and CSV file nomenclature
InformationURL.Description: The Explanation.html page at Fundamental Technologies describes how the numeric data from the Ulysses HISCALE instrument are divided into different print-groups, the nomenclature of the ASCII-based comma-separated variable (CSV) files, and how those files can be accessed.
